org.openstreetmap.osm.data.osmbin
Class NodesFile

java.lang.Object
  org.openstreetmap.osm.data.osmbin.FixedRecordFile
      org.openstreetmap.osm.data.osmbin.NodesFile

public class NodesFile
extends FixedRecordFile

(c) 2008 by here

Author:
Marcus Wolschon TODO: another schema for external attrs: a file of variable length records [[nodeID][length][...characters...]] that is appended to. TODO: implement nodex.id2 The NodeID in the record allows cleaning up and defragmenting the file. The byte-index into the file is stored in the attrvalue-slot prepended by a marker

writeNode

public void writeNode(Node aNode,
                      java.util.Set<java.lang.Long> wayIDs,
                      long aRecordNr)
               throws java.io.IOException
Write the given node. If it is already stored in the nodesFile, the old records are overwritten. If we require more or less records then before, allocation and deallocation are done here too.

Parameters:
aNode - the node to store
wayIDs - the IDs of all ways containing this node
aRecordNr - the first of the records this node is stored in
Throws:
java.io.IOException - on problems growing the file

Returns:
